::Windlord::

"By all the HAwks" yelled Windlord and Flew with all speed that his 
transmetal body let him. He moved to a sid to other trying to avoid 
Starlight's shoots, and chainging his derection avery time that he 
could...

"To all Maximals" Said the hawk in all frecuencies's maximals "I'm 
Windlord, I'm being attacked by Alliance Members... I'm neutral and I 
have in my arms a Maximal that was hurt in battle... Alliance's 
troops are attacked us... We need help... I repeat it... All here 
needs help... Follow my signal..." 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Fenox/Starlight::
> 
> Fenox catches the bomb, her eyes widening when she sees what it 
was. 
> She fligs it away from her. The bomb explodes, sending her crashing 
> backwards and falling to the ground.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Starlight jumps up from having stumbled and fallen back from 
> Windlord. "GET THOSE MAXIMALS!" She yells, jumping into the air and 
> firing her dart gun at Windlord.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > ::Windlord::
> > 
> > "Okay..." said Windlord "You win... "
> > 
> > He landed and  left his feathers, he was among the two bots. 
> Quickly

> at
